description: This file is the main program entry point for a .NET web API application using minimal hosting model. It sets up services such as OpenAPI (Swagger), CORS policy, and defines a simple health check endpoint.
external_files: OpenApi document (likely Swashbuckle or similar library)

methods.name: CreateBuilder
methods.description: Creates a WebApplicationBuilder with command line args.

methods.name: AddEndpointsApiExplorer
methods.description: Registers services for API explorer endpoints.

methods.name: Build
methods.description: Builds the WebApplication from the builder.

methods.name: UseCors
methods.description: Enables CORS middleware with specified policy.

methods.name: UseSwaggerUi
methods.description: Enables Swagger UI frontend for API documentation.

methods.name: MapGet
methods.description: Defines an HTTP GET endpoint at root '/' returning health status.
